category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 19 (Determination of venue for National Sports Competitions, etc.)
contents: Article 19 (Determination of the venue for the National Sports Competition, etc.) ① The venue for the National Sports Competition, etc. must be decided 5 years prior to the year of the National Sports Competition, and the committee shall do so based on the hosting application documents of the member city/provincial sports association that applied for hosting. The final decision is made by the board of directors after a preliminary review. Revised January 24, 2022. ② The Sports Council must complete the final inspection and confirm the selection of the venue within 6 months of the final deadline for hosting applications. ③ The committee may form and operate a subcommittee when it is necessary to listen to opinions or conduct on-site inspection on the application documents submitted by member city/provincial sports associations. Revised January 24, 2022. ④ If there are three or more member city/provincial sports associations that have applied for hosting, the committee shall select two member city/provincial sports associations after receiving the results of the subcommittee's on-site inspection and submit them to the board of directors as an agenda item. . Revised on January 24, 2022. ⑤ The Sports Association shall decide and approve the venue and report this to the Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism. ⑥ Cities and provinces that held the National Sports Competition (including cases where it was not held due to unavoidable circumstances) will host the National Boys Sports Competition in the year following the National Sports Competition, and the National Youth Sports Competition will be held in the year following the National Boys Sports Competition. A grand sports festival is held. However, in the case of the National Sports Festival, it may not be held if special circumstances are recognized. Revised 2016. 6. 16., 2022. 1. 24.
